div.p: The Mission of the Andalusia City Schools system is to ensure that students develop the knowledge and skills that will enable them to reach their full potential and become productive members of society. The system will accomplish this by providing a student-engaging program in a safe, caring environment with high academic standards taught by staff who are committed to continuous improvement.
1201 C. C. Baker Ave. Andalusia, AL 36421
